LanguageData.ZP_GroundSit.label: Sitting spot
LanguageData.ZP_GroundSit.description: Designate an empty spot where colonists may sit down. Convenient when using sheets and mats.
LanguageData.ZP_GroundSit_Blueprint.label: Sitting spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.ZP_GroundSit_Frame.label: Sitting spot (building)
LanguageData.ZP_GroundSit_Frame.description: Designate an empty spot where colonists may sit down. Convenient when using sheets and mats.
LanguageData.ZP_WaraZabuton.label: Straw zabuton
LanguageData.ZP_WaraZabuton.description: Simple rug that helps with sitting on the floor. Provides comfort equivalent to a stool.
LanguageData.ZP_WaraZabuton2nd.label: Straw zabuton
LanguageData.ZP_WaraZabuton2nd.description: Simple rug that helps with sitting on the floor. Provides comfort equivalent to a stool.
LanguageData.ZP_Zabuton.label: Zabuton
LanguageData.ZP_Zabuton.description: Simple rug that helps with sitting on the floor. Provides comfort equivalent to a stool.\nI got permission to borrow this graphic from another RimWorld modder, IGNI, who you may know for their Lost Forest mod.
LanguageData.ZP_Zabuton1st.label: Zabuton (Red)
LanguageData.ZP_Zabuton1st.description: Simple rug that helps with sitting on the floor. Provides comfort equivalent to a stool.\nI got permission to borrow this graphic from another RimWorld modder, IGNI, who you may know for their Lost Forest mod.
LanguageData.ZP_Zabuton2nd.label: Zabuton (Blue)
LanguageData.ZP_Zabuton2nd.description: Simple rug that helps with sitting on the floor. Provides comfort equivalent to a stool.\nI got permission to borrow this graphic from another RimWorld modder, IGNI, who you may know for their Lost Forest mod.
LanguageData.ZP_Zabuton3rd.label: Zabuton (Violet)
LanguageData.ZP_Zabuton3rd.description: Simple rug that helps with sitting on the floor. Provides comfort equivalent to a stool.\nI got permission to borrow this graphic from another RimWorld modder, IGNI, who you may know for their Lost Forest mod.
LanguageData.ZP_Tyabudai.label: Chabudai
LanguageData.ZP_Tyabudai.description: A small four-legged table that barely raises off the ground. People are expected to use either tatami or zabuton when sitting at one.
